p: Our models demonstrated that the horned frogs C. joazeirensis; C. ornata and C. stolzmanni had their smallest recorded areas of habitat suitability during the last inter-glacial, and that their areas varied very little during the climate changes that occurred during that period as compared to the other species of the Ceratophyidae, which demonstrated accentuated contractions or expansions of their areas of habitat suitability projected ( Fig 1).
